website_summaries.verdict: An exceedingly popular product recognized for its attractive look and helpful features.
pros: Comes with 6 shelves and 6 smaller mesh pockets on the sides
2 hooks atop product allow for hanging on closet bar or wire rack
Holds a decent amount of weight
cons: Frame can bend under heavy use and weight

customer_reviews.title: Lasted less than a year
customer_reviews.text: Broke less than a year after purchase, the hooks and square bar on the top of the item snapped in two places so now I’m afraid of putting any weight on it. Was used to organize movies in a game room closet so wasn’t holding too much weight. Pretty disappointed with it lasting such a short amount of time.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Hardin

customer_reviews.title: In Love!
customer_reviews.text: I had a cheaper one that velcroed around the closet rod and it broke, so i was in the market for another closet shelf organizer. Guys, I was not disappointed. This organizer is absolutely perfect. The hooks are really strong, and I have no fear of it breaking. The shelves are massive, I fit 7 pairs of shoes (stacked on top if each other) in one square. Also, its really long and almost reaches the floor giving you a sense of actual shelves instead of fabric. Im in love with this and think its a great but!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: Some permanent sags have developed in the center of each shelf and that gets pretty annoying.
customer_reviews.text: I have no shelves in my walk-in closet so this was a must-have for me. It generally does the job but overall it's "just okay". Some permanent sags have developed in the center of each shelf and that gets pretty annoying... All I have are a couple of shirts in each one (doesn't seem that heavy). I eventually plan to rig it up with some wire hangers to see if that fixes it but will have to deal in the meantime.
customer_reviews.author: wow_wow_wow

customer_reviews.title: Trash! Don’t buy!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Worst thing ever purchased on Amazon! I don’t know whoever quality tested these things but clearly they never tried to put anything in them! Within an 24 hours of hanging them it with a couple of normal sz Medium US women’s sweaters per slot, the seams pulled and tore. This thing is absolute garbage! I have tried to repair it with duct tape but it’s clear that’s not going to last. Of course we can always send these products back, but the effort isn’t worth the effort to drive to the UPS Store. Trust me, though. These are trash!
customer_reviews.author: Anne Bosworth

customer_reviews.title: Shelving seems strong not cheap cardboard.............
customer_reviews.text: I was very impressed with this product. I did some research and found that a lot of these items just buckled and didn't stand the course of time. I have to say this one seems pretty strong. I use it in my daughters room to get her clothes organized for the week and anything she needs to take with her to school we pop in the alcove for that day so we don't forget. I find the shelves quite strong which I liked. The cubby holes are quite big also which is nice. I highly recommend this product. I'm looking to buy another one in the near future.
customer_reviews.author: H. Marshall

customer_reviews.title: The perfect organizer for small spaces
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this! I was in the market for something that would provide better organization for my athletic wear/lounge wear and needed something that allowed further break down of my clothing. I found this on amazon and figured for the price and reviews it didn't hurt to try it out. Everything people have said is true. It's incredibly easy to take out and set up and it holds a lot more than it looks like it should. The coloring is also nice, at least for my place and blends in well in my closet. I'm now able to separate my clothes into different groups and have a more functional way to keep some items that were before inconveniently placed.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: These are great! I don't have a dresser
customer_reviews.text: These are great! I don't have a dresser, and I hate hanging up all my clothes. Theyre always falling off and it takes up so much valuable closet space. I bout 2 of these and it gave me 12 cubbies to work with!it holds all my leggings, all my shirts, all my jeans, tanks, shorts and pajamas! Even with all that weight, the shelves are not bending. These are great so far. I'll update if they start falling apart, but they look well made.
customer_reviews.author: Nadine

customer_reviews.title: It doesn't look like it holds all the clothes that I want on ...
customer_reviews.text: The picture makes it seem shorter than it is. It doesn't look like it holds all the clothes that I want on them. I bought two. I just put clothes on them nothing else. The top is caving in. I'll wait until it breaks and buy from another place. Overall I love the color I bought them in and I like the pockets on the sides as well.
customer_reviews.author: Whitney

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed :(
customer_reviews.text: Now here it goes.... I just got this in the mail not even five hours ago and it already has failed me. Assembling is not the easiest, especially when you have to insert a whole squared spine w/ the hooks that barely stay in place when hung. I went to check out why was is slanted on one side, I didn’t over pack it with anything heavy. I went to do a quick adjust to the “hooks” and the whole stitching on the top came off when adjusting....making my whole organizer fall. I’m highly disappointed. I’m probably going to look for an expensive one that’s better quality :(
customer_reviews.author: Miya Sylva

customer_reviews.title: Great Hanging closet organizer
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased this product before but the 5 shelf. It's pretty sturdy as long as you don't overload the shelves. Distribute the weight evenly and it will work well for you.
customer_reviews.author: Bec4

customer_reviews.title: LOVE It!
customer_reviews.text: Why haven't I purchased these sooner? They are PERFECT for organizing my closet. :) I use one for my summer clothes (swimsuits, cover-ups, tank tops, shorts & capris and the other I use for my leggings and miscellaneous items that never seem to have a place to land. If you roll things up you can fit a ton in each bin!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Unhappy waste of money
customer_reviews.text: I was so happy to finally get this to my son. Well I put it up. I placed 4 shirts five socks and one pair of pants. It came apart. At the top right as soon as I walked away. Then the other side of the top came undone and it fell to the floor. Very upset. I have sent emails and not once has the company contacted me about this. Waste of money and never again will I buy anything from this company.
customer_reviews.author: Olivia Perry

customer_reviews.title: Organizes a week of baby's daycare supplies
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to organize my son's clothes for daycare. He's a baby, so has a lot of small stuff. This is our first week using it, but I already am a big fan. It gives me a place to organize all of his stuff at the beginning of the week and then save time packing and getting out the door. I think this will be a huge sanity saver for me!
customer_reviews.author: Caskills Elliptic

customer_reviews.title: Good product- needs a stronger/better designed hanging frame
customer_reviews.text: Great price, look, and storage capacity at first. But, unfortunately, as with most of these hanging shelves they aren’t designed well to actually hold weight. Mine only has underwear and socks in it and the too, where the hangers are connected started ripping almost immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Review

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed in poor quality
customer_reviews.text: I was very disappointed in this product. It ripped as soon as I tried to assemble it to put it in my closet. Its pretty much hanging on by a few threads -hope it gets me through a couple months. But the crookedness is really bothersome!
customer_reviews.author: Annabel

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and Good !
customer_reviews.text: Surprisingly sturdy. I have been using one from Walmart and then bought this. Huge difference in the two. one star less since I haven’t found the side pockets that helpful since they are flimsy pouches than a solid space to put socks and handkerchief. Overall it’s good and I might buy one more for that price.
customer_reviews.author: Aashish Baldwa

customer_reviews.title: Not Worth Your Money
customer_reviews.text: At first this product seemed like it would be perfect for my needs (I.e. holding the lighter weight shirts, work out clothes, leggings); I was wrong. Not even one week after placing the items in the cubbies, they immediately bent with the most minor weight. As I was carefully moving and shifting the weight inside each cubby the supporting metal bar broke in half. I’m extremely disappointed with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Vickman

customer_reviews.title: Perfect storage option
customer_reviews.text: Big fan!! I had purchased another similar item, which was far too small. This one is just the right size to allow shoe storage, which is why I purchased it. Plenty of room to store other items, as well
customer_reviews.author: Skibikeplease

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I had this thing filled up less than ten minutes after the delivery guy dropped it off and I totally love it! It holds a lot and is pretty sturdy. I won’t put anything too heavy on it to be safe, but for pajamas and slippers and towels....this thing is priceless to me
customer_reviews.author: Michelley

customer_reviews.title: Great for storing my skeins of yarn!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these units to store my skeins of yarn and they are perfect!! It was very easy to put the hanger in at the top, and it holds all the yarn I can fit into it without buckling or straining at the top. Really like this product and would buy it again. Fantastic way to store my growing yarn addiction:)
customer_reviews.author: gbmaltese

customer_reviews.title: Great for Teenagers
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my granddaughter. Her family have very limited space. So, this was a great solution. She loves the side pockets. As soon as she hung it up, all her makeup and hair products went in the side pockets. She loves it. And, I am happy to give her something she uses
customer_reviews.author: Lily Pad

customer_reviews.title: I would buy this again.
customer_reviews.text: I love that I can change the direction of the hooks to my needs. The compartments are large . I am able to store several pairs of jeans/pants in one spot . I liked it so much I placed an order for a second one for my shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Daniell Peri

customer_reviews.title: flimsy, badly made, does not hold up to normal (or less than normal) clothing load
customer_reviews.text: The unit itself arrived on time and looked great when I first hung it in my closet, however once I started placing folded laundry onto the organizer the flimsy wire frame began to bend and stretch, I have not put anything on the shelf other than folded clothing items, and I have not even filled the unit to capacity on any of the shelves! This unit is very cheaply made and does not get the job done. I'd suggest spending your money elsewhere for a closet organizer.
customer_reviews.author: austin

customer_reviews.title: I love the sturdiness of this organizer
customer_reviews.text: I love the sturdiness of this organizer, the only thing (my fault) that I don't like is how LONG they are! It touches the floor! I did not anticipate it would be that long, or maybe my old closets have a shorter bar than others. Otherwise, maybe a color other than brown would be more attractive? Like Khaki? Navy blue?
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa R.

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed at the right price
customer_reviews.text: I really like this hanging closet organizer. It's exactly what I needed to organize some of my items. I was so surprised at the high price of very similar products and was so happy to find this one at the right price. So far it seems like a durable and quality piece. I love the mesh pockets as a little bonus. It's everything I wanted at a reasonable cost.
customer_reviews.author: Janon

customer_reviews.title: Big space saver in closet
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love my hanging organizer. I have all my sweaters, scarves and two out of season purses in it. It makes a very neat presentation as you open the closet door. Very heavy duty, durable and appears it will last quite a long time. I would order again.
customer_reviews.author: VERA MAROLT

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Compatible to more expensive versions.
customer_reviews.text: Good product. It does what it supposed to and doesn’t look cheap although it’s not expensive at all. I have a similar product that I bought from IKEA about a year ago that was almost twice as much and this one seems to be just as nice.
customer_reviews.author: Gabe

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely perfect for undergarment organization!
customer_reviews.text: I’d post a photo, but I’m using this to organize my bras and there’s a reason they go in the closet! Absolutely love this for my application because I have a ton of them, don’t like them to get crushed, and this is perfect for storing them side-by-side. Not sure how it’d hold up with a ton of weight, but it’s perfect for me.
customer_reviews.author: Molly

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Small Spaces
customer_reviews.text: I needed some more shelves but did not want a bulky container or something that would crowd my room. I purchased 3 of these and they are perfect. All of my clothes fit perfectly in them and they have saved me from clutter. I love the side pockets for shoes or under garments. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: adrian g.

customer_reviews.title: As expected! Happy with purchase
customer_reviews.text: Super thin wire frame doesn't look like it would hold up, but it definitely has. Very happy with purchase. The pockets on the sides are a plus too!
customer_reviews.author: L

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money!!!
customer_reviews.text: I hung this up on Sunday evening, placing t-shirts gym shorts and a few pair of swimming trunks in the compartments. Absolutely nothing heavy!!! I woke up this morning, walked into my closet to get dressed and found my clothing all over the ground and this device completely destroyed. The seem around the entire top tore completely off!
customer_reviews.author: Scott lomagistro

customer_reviews.title: Closet organizer
customer_reviews.text: This was such a great bargain! It was sturdier than I expected and has more than enough room in each pocket. It fits perfectly in my walk in closet.
customer_reviews.author: Aimee Nekoranik

customer_reviews.title: Good Shelving
customer_reviews.text: Shelves are supported by some form of cardboard which keeps it flat, unlike some others of the same. Athough not that rigid, its better than none. Had this for less than a week now, but seems goods at this front end. At this time, I would recommend. Will write a review in a couple months.
customer_reviews.author: **Hawaiian**

customer_reviews.title: Shelves bow and bend down. Don’t buy this.
customer_reviews.text: All the shelves are bowed and bending with hardly anything on them. Not happy. I have an older different brand one that is perfect and not bowed.
customer_reviews.author: Shopper Gal

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed with this product!! Super flimsy material, the wire support that the hanger connects to is thin and already bending. I had only filled this thing mayyyybe halfway before it started to rip at the seams. On a positive note - it is a good size. But why make the compartments so big if the material can't support the weight? I am returning the item.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth O.

customer_reviews.title: Saves closet space!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up. I put heavier things on top and lighter at bottom to keep its shape. Would recommend. Looks great in my closet!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon J

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is the best! I bought something similar at Target and it broke within a couple of weeks because it was hanging by cloth -- this product feels sturdy and hangs by metal hangers. We use it to hang my boyfriend's pants in the top two -- they fit perfectly! It fits several pairs of pants, actually. In the bottom parts we keep random knick knacks, everything is perfectly stable. It's a little small across but it works!
customer_reviews.author: Maddi

customer_reviews.title: Space saver
customer_reviews.text: Needed extra storage in the closet that didn’t take up a lot of space. This is perfect for that. Hold so many times and has pockets on both sides too!
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: sturdy and roomy
customer_reviews.text: This replaces a prrvious unit where the conection at the top...4 rivets...had torn off. I was pleased to see this has an internal metal bracket with the hanger hooks that appears to be very durable. The shelves are large and quite a lot of t shirts and sweatshirts will fit.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn DumondTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Accessiblity
customer_reviews.text: I use this to keep all my soap making and crafts in for accessiblity. I just ordered another one. Great value
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great item for storing clothes in the closet
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good with all my clothes in it! Haven’t weighted it, but the hanger is looking pretty sturdy. Fits a lot of clothes in it, although I like another hanging closet that is longer. Worth getting!
customer_reviews.author: S. Gee

customer_reviews.title: Good buy!
customer_reviews.text: Needed this to get more space out of my closet. I really like it. Good for folding up tanks and other clothing bits and pieces. Not really the best looking when you have it full of clothes but I love the extra storage space that it gives me.
customer_reviews.author: Lyn Ivory

customer_reviews.title: Won't bow on the top, pockets are helpful!
customer_reviews.text: Received this for my locker at work. Good quality for the price. I've had these hangers before and have had problems with them bowing on the top. The way this one is constructed I don't think that will be a problem also the pockets on the side are super helpful! Will try to update this is a few months to let y'all know how it wears.
customer_reviews.author: Dr.CorryTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Exactly what I needed to store things since moving & now using a smaller closet. I love how deep the shelves are & that it has the mesh, see-through pocket sleeves on both sides.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this organizer to store shoes. I am extremely happy with my purchase - I may buy another to travel with.
customer_reviews.author: Jenner

customer_reviews.title: Would purchase again!
customer_reviews.text: Very convenient, great storage space, was very easy to put in my closet and assemble, holds more than I thought it would. Overall great purchase and the price was very acceptable!
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Huffman

customer_reviews.title: This has worked out so great for my closet
customer_reviews.text: This has worked out so great for my closet. I have every compartment full and it is holding up very nicely. The side mesh pockets are a great feature for smaller items. I'm considering buying another to help organize my newborn sons closet when he arrives. Can't beat this, especially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Layla

customer_reviews.title: Better Organization
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these and turned my empty bathroom closet into a linen closet. Now I get much better use of the space. I use these products to hold towels and sheets. I use the side pockets for surplus bathroom supplies.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Smithson

customer_reviews.title: smells bad
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't seem very sturdy compared to the ones from ikea and it also has a stinky/bitter factor odor.
customer_reviews.author: KL

customer_reviews.title: I Would recommend these shelves
customer_reviews.text: I bought several of these for different uses. One is for my sweaters and winter clothing in my closet. I used another for our board games. Both are holding up well although I had to put the extra games underneath the shelves to take some weight off the hangers. I did fill it to the brim so it definitely exceeded the weight limit. I Would recommend these shelves!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love the side pouches for extra storage.
customer_reviews.text: Love this storage unit, put all my hand and dish towels n wash cloths ect. Very strong and price is good.
customer_reviews.author: Celeste mccafferty

customer_reviews.title: So useful. Meets expectations
customer_reviews.text: I use this in our storage room to hold extra clothes. I could only fit two sweaters per compartment but could fit 4-5 dresses folder per compartment because the dresses are flatter than sweaters. For the price, this product more than meets expectations of quality, use, and appearance.
customer_reviews.author: Vee Elle

customer_reviews.title: its ok for small stuff
customer_reviews.text: in my closet and then handed it down to my kids worked great but don't overfill it like I did.
customer_reviews.author: shelly schrader

customer_reviews.title: Top seam ripped out after a few days!
customer_reviews.text: I bought two, one of them has been fine. The other, with a comparable amount of clothing comprised of t-shirts, socks, and underwear, ripped out overnight and sent the contents of our closet scattering over the room. There was nothing heavy in the shelves, they're just very flimsy.
customer_reviews.author: BarnDougan

customer_reviews.title: Useful, holds alot, strong material! Buy it!!!
customer_reviews.text: Strong, big lots of space. Holds a lot of stuff. Really like it. Will buy more. Deff recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Jenny Cruz

customer_reviews.title: Nothing to do, but hang it up!
customer_reviews.text: This closet amplifier has lots of room for bulky sweaters and such. Just what I needed moving from a home with three times the closet space. My mom's getting hers next! Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: tracy m watson

customer_reviews.title: Some support inside each shelve helps it keep it's shape ...
customer_reviews.text: Some support inside each shelve helps it keep it's shape! The sewing isn't entirely level (some shelves are a bit tilted), but for the price and the rest of the build quality that's quite reasonable. Plus it's a hanging shelf, it's never going to be perfectly stable, so the tilt doesn't matter much
customer_reviews.author: pkchch

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, thick, holds a ton
customer_reviews.text: I needed vertical storage in my closet. This is sturdy, thick, and holds a ton.
customer_reviews.author: Deb Runner

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and well made
customer_reviews.text: The mechanism for hanging includes a metal hangar with 2 hooks - making it much sturdier than other similar products. Good quality cloth and stitching. Like the extra functionality of pockets on the sides. Five stars!
customer_reviews.author: SGA

customer_reviews.title: Fast shipping
customer_reviews.text: The shipping was fast. I ordered on Monday night/Tuesday morning and it arrived on Thursday even tho I just got the free shipping. I’m trying to buy a hanging organizer like the ones I got from Nordstrom Rack many years ago. This one looks very closely the same as the one I had but from a different manufacturing company. Hopefully the material will hold out like my old one as it never even broke, very durable.
customer_reviews.author: Helene Hoang

customer_reviews.title: Top mount portion is a really thin metal wire frame ...
customer_reviews.text: Top mount portion is a really thin metal wire frame. It WILL break and bend under any kind of notable weight i.e. jeans and a couple shoes.
customer_reviews.author: CB

customer_reviews.title: same as picture but not strong enough to carry too much cloths
customer_reviews.text: the top iron string seems not strong enough to carry the weight, after filling the box, the string becomes curved and worry it may fall or broke overtime
customer_reviews.author: boyce

customer_reviews.title: Hanging organizer
customer_reviews.text: Could be a little larger. But for the most part works very well
customer_reviews.author: Mitch

customer_reviews.title: Hanging closet shelf.
customer_reviews.text: One, two, three and it was hanging in my closet. Meets my needs and I am happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Juanita Weed

customer_reviews.title: Very well made and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Makes things so much easier to reach for my mom who is in a wheel chair. She has a hard time reaching things in her dresser so we put these in her closet. She loves them. She still has a little independence left.
customer_reviews.author: Tonja L. Marotta

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: This hanging shelf is exactly as described! I'm very pleased with the size, durability and usefulness! I use it for storing my winter cardigans and flannel shirts. There's plenty of room for me to lay my things flat to avoid wrinkles. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Sanders

customer_reviews.title: Storage space saver
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my son's dorm. Very durable. Packed it with many different items like, towels, bars of soap, first aid kit, cold medicines, box of q tips and many other supply items. Holding up well so far. It's been almost a month now.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install. Seems pretty durable
customer_reviews.text: I bought this when I moved into my apartment. My highlights: - Super easy to install. Just need to put through both hooks through the top - Seems to be pretty durable - Looks great!
customer_reviews.author: Albert Moy

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I liked the price and it works for my purpose of organizing things.
customer_reviews.author: HeavenlyRain

customer_reviews.title: Fits in well with a small closet
customer_reviews.text: This hanger closet is useful for holding multiple items. I have put all my shirts, pants, and equipment into the 6 shelves, and it is holding it pretty good. I would not recommend putting TOO much weight into a single shelf, and it should be distributed equally.
customer_reviews.author: eric chow

customer_reviews.title: Good value and easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: I purchased more expensive organizers at the same time as these. These are not as sturdy and I am worried that the hangers will break if you place too much inside of the shelves. Still better than the others I purchased because at least these are not missing assembly pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Broken within 3 weeks
customer_reviews.text: The shelf completely ripped at the top and each and every shelf droops. It was holding leggings, underwear, and bras (not heavy stuff!). I’m going to get something else for my closet since this is not sturdy by any means. Very disappointed cause it looked nice in my closet.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Excellent closet organizer esp when you have very little to ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent closet organizer esp when you have very little to work with in terms of pre-set shelving/ drawers and closets.
customer_reviews.author: Lennox Adundo

customer_reviews.title: Great re-design!
customer_reviews.text: I love the new hanging style, instead of the old cloth woven piece, that would eventually give out. This new all metal with two hooks piece is awesome, well done. I have already bought a separate but similar piece, and will be buying others
customer_reviews.author: Kim. H. tx

customer_reviews.title: Worth the buck!
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to assemble and a good amount of storage! It was really worth the buy and it was cheaper than other similar options on Amazon! Not the sturdiest when it comes to the cardboard inbetween the boxes, it curves slightly but it doesn't personally bother me.
customer_reviews.author: Rita.T

customer_reviews.title: Made well, works perfectly for organizing
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Using in our camper closet and it’s holding up very well!
customer_reviews.author: Tasha M.

customer_reviews.title: Great for organization in your closet
customer_reviews.text: This is awesome if you're in need of some extra storage in your closet. Mine has held up well, even with the ammount of things I end up using it for.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied!
customer_reviews.text: Already had a similar product but I bought this one because of the hangar-type attachment it uses to hold itself up. Wasn’t disappointed! Structure looks sturdy and doesn’t seem strained even when completely loaded with folded clothes and such.
customer_reviews.author: Marcel

customer_reviews.title: I bought 2 of the 5 shelf Hanging closets first and loved them so I then ordered 2 of the 6 ...
customer_reviews.text: Lots of storage at a small price! I bought 2 of the 5 shelf Hanging closets first and loved them so I then ordered 2 of the 6 shelf hanging closets for another closet. Sturdy and hold a lot! You can't go wrong with this product. Lots of Bang for your buck!!
customer_reviews.author: marvaloma

customer_reviews.title: Cheap material
customer_reviews.text: I am upset that my 6 Shelves with pockets on sides was not sturdy at all when I began to put the clothes in the slots the material began to tear , Very upset because I didn't even get to the third shelve and it tore. The amount of clothes were not heavy at all because I was trying to test it, Not satisfied at all
customer_reviews.author: Shawn Sawyer

customer_reviews.title: Nice product. Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Loved this for sweaters. They used to be stored in containers under my bed. What a hassle that was. Wish I had thought of this years ago. Happy with quality and will be purchasing another
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: Holding up
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for a few months. It provides plenty of space, but I saw reviews saying not to overload them, so I only put undies, socks, and scarves in them. The top fabric where the hanger holds on does seem to be under a lot of tension even with close to nothing in it. Even so, nothing has ripped, so things are looking good.
customer_reviews.author: Chev

customer_reviews.title: Just as described
customer_reviews.text: Great product, easy assembly... we will see how durable they are.
customer_reviews.author: GatorBait

customer_reviews.title: Holds a lot of weight without warping so far
customer_reviews.text: I’m using these to organize my office closet and am so far very pleased with how much weight they’re able to handle. The bottom of each shelf is reinforced so it holds its shape. The hooks are attached to a frame around the top that appears designed to be flexible to hold a good amount of weight. I’m hopeful they hold up! I have craft supplies, a huge case of DVDs/Blu-Rays, office supplies, etc put in these.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Cannot hold much weight
customer_reviews.text: This has a lot of room, but unfortunately doesn't hold much weight. I was using this to store my towels and sheets. Within 2 weeks it has torn at the top. I don't recommend this unless you are storing something very lightweight.
customer_reviews.author: Leah

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: I am going to buy a few more, holds a LOT
customer_reviews.author: lynette

customer_reviews.title: Great Size and Space
customer_reviews.text: It fits perfectly and works well, but it kinda smelled when I first opened it. The smell went away in a day. In the picture below you’ll see that it’s already starting to bend, but it seems normal.
customer_reviews.author: Jose A

customer_reviews.title: Great price and really good quality!
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed! Perfect to organize scarfs, gloves, etc, in the hallway closet. Might get another later for the clothes. Love the side pockets! Great price and really good quality!
customer_reviews.author: Heloise

customer_reviews.title: Practical and easy to set up!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up and practical! love this organizer i can use it to store so many items!!!
customer_reviews.author: joe

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this to help me organize my closet and it is exactly what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Wanda Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Simple functionality
customer_reviews.text: These shelves have helped my husband and I organize our closet at a fraction of the cost of going to the ‘organization ‘ type stores. My husband no longer needs to use a dresser.
customer_reviews.author: Salliac

customer_reviews.title: Good size
customer_reviews.text: They are actually bigger than I thought. They will work great
customer_reviews.author: JoLyn

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: Works perfect for my 2yo’s clothes! Has a lot of space in each cube too.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: We bought this item for our son who is being ...
customer_reviews.text: We bought this item for our son who is being deployed. He is going to use it in his living quarters. Let you know when he returns.
customer_reviews.author: irish15pilot

customer_reviews.title: Organizing made simple.
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing. I use it for all my jeans, shorts, track pants, joggers etc. Its perfect and super simple. Great organizing tool.
customer_reviews.author: KAMF08

customer_reviews.title: Ideal for my craft room
customer_reviews.text: The product arrived quickly and in perfect condition. I needed storage for items that are used frequently but I didn't want to take up drawer space. This product is ideal.
customer_reviews.author: D. Dietrich

customer_reviews.title: Durable and Affordable!
customer_reviews.text: Waited a substantial amount of time before reviewing this so I could see how long it would really stand and within the six months that I’ve had it, no issues whatsoever. Perfect amount of storage for clothing necessities that would normally fit into my dresser. I also really like the 3 side pockets on each side for extra storage. For the price and quality it’s worth the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Chi

customer_reviews.title: Great storage space looks nice
customer_reviews.text: Great for maximizng closet space. Each compartment is a great size for shoes/clothes.
customer_reviews.author: JJ Wolfe

customer_reviews.title: Keeps me organized
customer_reviews.text: Love this organizer. Had some similar ones in the past and this ones lasted the longest and have held the most. Keep a organized closet for better peace of mind.
customer_reviews.author: Obay

customer_reviews.title: Very Flimsy
customer_reviews.text: I set this up the day I received it and overnight the top piece just ripped off. I had only put a couple towels and toiletries in it so it wasnt that heavy. I'm a bit disappointed because I was excited for the extra storage capabilities but I was let down.
customer_reviews.author: Meghann
